scripts.prod-build: npm run prod-build-en & npm run prod-build-fr
scripts.prod-build-allForms-en: npm run prod-company-build-external-en & npm run prod-company-build-internal-en & npm run prod-dossier-build-external-en & npm run prod-dossier-build-internal-en & npm run prod-transaction-build-en & npm run prod-applicationInfo-build-en
scripts.prod-company-build: npm run prod-company-build-external & npm run prod-company-build-internal
scripts.prod-company-build-external: npm run prod-company-build-external-en & npm run prod-company-build-external-fr
scripts.prod-company-build-external-en: ng run company:build --configuration=production-en --outputPath=dist/prod/company/en & npm run replace-in-file-co-en
scripts.prod-company-build-external-fr: ng run company:build --configuration=production-fr --outputPath=dist/prod/company/fr & npm run replace-in-file-co-fr
scripts.prod-company-build-internal: npm run prod-company-build-internal-en & npm run prod-company-build-internal-fr
scripts.prod-company-build-internal-en: ng run company_internal:build --configuration=production-en --outputPath=dist/prod/company_internal/en & npm run replace-in-file-co-en
scripts.prod-company-build-internal-fr: ng run company_internal:build --configuration=production-fr --outputPath=dist/prod/company_internal/fr & npm run replace-in-file-co-fr
scripts.prod-transaction-build: npm run prod-transaction-build-en & npm run prod-transaction-build-fr
scripts.prod-transaction-build-en: ng run transaction:build --configuration=production-en --outputPath=dist/prod/transaction/en & npm run replace-in-file-rt-en
scripts.prod-transaction-build-fr: ng run transaction:build --configuration=production-fr --outputPath=dist/prod/transaction/fr & npm run replace-in-file-rt-fr
scripts.prod-applicationInfo-build: npm run prod-applicationInfo-build-en & npm run prod-applicationInfo-build-fr
scripts.prod-applicationInfo-build-en: ng run applicationInfo:build --configuration=production-en --outputPath=dist/prod/applicationInfo/en & npm run replace-in-file-ai-en
scripts.prod-applicationInfo-build-fr: ng run applicationInfo:build --configuration=production-fr --outputPath=dist/prod/applicationInfo/fr & npm run replace-in-file-ai-fr
